questions.question: Write the abbreviation of JSON ?
questions.answer: JSON Stands for Javascript Object Notations

questions.question: Write the abbreviation of JSX ?
questions.answer: JSX is a extension, JSX Stands for JavaScript and XML Documents

questions.answer: React is Famous Javascript Library, It mainly used to create Front End Application Easily

questions.question: What is meant by DOM
questions.answer: DOM Stand for Document Object Model, It mainly help us to render the change happen in a react application
